Library      URL                                          License
================================================================================
bullet     - https://github.com/bulletphysics/bullet3   - zlib
ecs        - https://github.com/tapio/ecs               - MIT
gif-h      - https://github.com/ginsweater/gif-h        - Public Domain
GL         - http://www.opengl.org/registry/            - MIT
glad       - https://github.com/Dav1dde/glad            - MIT
glm        - http://glm.g-truc.net/                     - MIT
ImGui      - https://github.com/ocornut/imgui           - MIT
iqm        - https://github.com/lsalzman/iqm            - Public Domain
json11     - https://github.com/dropbox/json11          - MIT
magic_enum - https://github.com/Neargye/magic_enum      - MIT
Remotery   - https://github.com/Celtoys/Remotery        - Apache 2.0
SDL2       - https://www.libsdl.org/                    - zlib
SoLoud     - http://soloud-audio.com/                   - zlib
stb_image  - https://github.com/nothings/stb            - Public Domain
